      • namesOfRunners

        public static java.lang.String namesOfRunners(java.util.List<be.inglease.Runner> runners)
        Returns:
        a String with the names of all Runners separated with a '#' sorted on their weight. (Print the runners to see you've sorted correctly.) (hint: Use the reduce function.)

      • setSpeedToMeterPerSecond

        public static void setSpeedToMeterPerSecond(java.util.List<be.inglease.Runner> runners)
        Change the speed of all the runs to m/s. Print all the runs before the change and after the change. Use method a method reference for the printing. (hint: Run has a toString() method already.) This is a nice exercise to see in which order your stream get parsed.
